mapper.insert: insert tbl_ft_sales (u_id, location, lat, lng) VALUES(#{u_id}, #{location}, #{lat}, #{lng})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_ft_sales where date(work_date)=date(now()) and u_id=#{u_id}
mapper.update: update tbl_ft_sales set close_time= now() where date(work_date)=date(now()) and u_id=#{u_id}
